iaik.security.random

Class RandomInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • iaik.security.random.RandomInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class RandomInputStream
extends java.io.InputStream
    An InputStream that reads data from a Random number generator. The Random number generator can be java.util.Random or one of its subclasses java.security.SecureRandom, iaik.security.random.SecRandom, etc.
    Version:
    File Revision 12

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RandomInputStream(java.util.Random random)
      Create a new RandomInputStream that reads from the specified random number generator.

      Read b.length bytes.

      • available

        public int available()
        Return the number of bytes available for a non-blocking read from this stream. As the stream is of unlimited length, we return Integer.MAX_VALUE (231 - 1). This method never throws an IOException.
        Overrides:
        available in class java.io.InputStream
